data.title: How Do I Budget?: Answer This
data.meta_description: EPF_17_Personal_Financal_Planning_Budgeting_CS__How_Do_I_Budget__7.docx - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Alana is worried about being able to afford college costs and living expenses. She has only saved $56 despite working part-time for 3 years. Sharon advises Alana to create a budget to better understand her spending. Alana tracks her expenses for a month, which total $504. This reveals she spends more on wants like coffee and movies than needs. While angry at first thinking her boss is stealing, the numbers show Alana is simply spending all her earnings. Sharon outlines options for Alana like working more hours, cutting wants, or adjusting her budget using the 50/30/20 method to save the $3,000 needed.
data.text: How Do I Budget?: Answer This
